person.persName: Joshua Bethel Bowles (Jefferson County, Kentucky, farmer and president of the Bank of Louisville)

body.p: Jefferson County, Kentucky, farmer and president of the Bank of Louisville. Virginia native. Married to Mary D. Winchester Bowles in Jefferson County, Kentucky, on July 3, 1821. Father of Mary E. Bowles Barbour. Married to Grace Shreve Bowles. Father of Margaretta Bowles, James W. Bowles, John B. Bowles, and Mary E. Bowles. Farmer in Jefferson County in 1850. Owned eight enslaved persons in Jefferson County in 1850. President of the Bank of Louisville in Jefferson County in 1860. Owned ten enslaved persons in Jefferson County in 1860. Employed one enslaved person owned by Josephine Taylor in Louisville in 1860. President of the Bank of Louisville in Jefferson County in 1861. President of the Bank of Louisville in Jefferson County in 1865.
